about_the_game:
ORPHEUS: Tale of a Lover


Embark on an epic journey through the depths of the Ancient Greek underworld in ORPHEUS: Tale of a Lover. This unique game combines fast-paced FPS action, bureaucratic mythical comedy and rich storytelling for an immersive experience like no other.

A Fast-Paced FPS in Ancient Greece

Step into the sandals of Orpheus, a talented musician, fearless adventurer and passionate lover. Battle mythical creatures, solve intricate puzzles and navigate treacherous landscapes in intense first-person combat. Unleash devastating attacks and unlock powerful abilities as you become the hero of your own mythological tale.

Mythical Action

Prepare for heart-pounding action as you face off against menacing creatures, including the fearsome Cyclops and their army of Harpies. Engage in adrenaline-pumping battles, utilizing a variety of combat techniques and strategic maneuvers to overcome your foes. Discover hidden passages and immerse yourself in the visually stunning Ancient Greek setting.

Tartarus is Struggling With Paperwork

Experience a twist on mythological storytelling as you navigate the whimsical bureaucracy of Tartarus. Encounter eccentric characters like the femme fatale Medusa and the romantic Minotaur. Overcome absurd obstacles and outsmart bureaucratic red tape in this comedic adventure.

A Bard-baric Journey

Delve into a captivating narrative inspired by Greek mythology, where love, loss, and redemption intertwine. Experience the emotional journey of Orpheus as he battles both mythical creatures and inner demons. Uncover the secrets of the underworld and rewrite the fate of Orpheus and his beloved Eurydice.

A Cozy Bed-time Story... Maybe Not

ORPHEUS blends elements of fantasy, comedy, and action into a captivating adventure. With enchanting visuals, an immersive soundtrack, and unexpected twists, prepare for a unique gaming experience that will keep you engaged from start to finish.



Embark on an extraordinary journey through the Ancient Greek underworld in ORPHEUS: Tale of a Lover. Challenge the gods, overcome bureaucratic chaos, and discover the true power of love in this unforgettable gaming experience.
